A warm and inviting bar scene, dimly lit with amber glow. The long wooden bar stretches across, with a row of plush, high-backed stools waiting for patrons. Behind the bar, shelves stocked with bottles are softly illuminated, and a well-lit fridge on the right promises cold drinks. It looks like a cozy spot for a night out.

A vibrant and playful view of a recreation area with a bright blue billiard table taking center stage on a striking red carpet. In the background, there's a glimpse of a well-stocked bar, and a 'Red Bull Open' sign adds a splash of neon. An arched doorway in the brick wall leads to what looks like another part of the venue, hinting at more fun to be had.

name: Autotransport Boban
description: With Autotransport Boban, your prized possessions are always in motion, safely and swiftly. Whether it's your car, yacht, or boat, we're on call 24/7 to ensure a smooth journey. We're not just transporting vehicles we're delivering peace of mind, one mile at a time.

gallery.alt: A silver Mercedes-Benz SUV is towing a white and blue Bayliner boat on a trailer down a paved residential street with houses on either side under a clear blue sky

A silver Mercedes-Benz SUV is backing a yellow and white speed boat on a trailer into a body of water from a concrete boat ramp. Several other boats are docked in the background, and hills are visible in the distance under a sunny sky. A person is visible in the driver's seat of the SUV

A silver Mercedes-Benz SUV is towing a white Mercedes-Benz sedan loaded onto a flatbed car transport trailer down a paved residential street with houses and trees in the background under a clear blue sky

name: Paragliding Ohrid
description: Prepare to embrace the sky with our paragliding adventures from the majestic Mount Galicica, overlooking the serene beauty of Ohrid. We believe in more than just a flight we offer a personal journey into the clouds, guided by passionate pilots who share your thrill. Feel the wind whisper against your face as you launch into an unforgettable panorama, where the deep blue of Lake Ohrid merges with the endless horizon. We're here to help you not just fly, but to truly feel the freedom and magic of the moment, creating memories that will lift your spirit long after your feet touch the ground. Your adventure, our passion – together, we'll soar.

gallery.alt: Aerial view from a paraglider showing the vast, deep blue Lake Ohrid meeting a vibrant green forested coastline with winding roads, under a clear sky
A paraglider's view looking out over Lake Ohrid at sunset, with the water reflecting the warm colors of the sky and distant land bathed in golden light
A person in sunglasses and a helmet is seen mid-air during a tandem paragliding flight over Lake Ohrid, with a large aquapark and green landscape visible below
A paraglider's eye view from a tandem flight showing the expansive blue waters of Lake Ohrid, curving around the densely populated town of Ohrid with its many buildings and a visible coastline
A person in a blue jacket and helmet is captured in a selfie-style view during a tandem paragliding flight over very clear, turquoise waters of Lake Ohrid, with distant land and a cloudy sky
Two colorful paragliders are seen high in the air over a sprawling green mountain, with the vast blue Lake Ohrid stretching into the distance under a bright sky
A paraglider's view looking down over the vibrant turquoise waters of Lake Ohrid, with the densely packed red-roofed buildings of Ohrid town nestled along the curved coastline

name: Urban Shine Ohrid
description: Urban Shine Ohrid is your premier destination for meticulous car detailing and expert furniture cleaning. We bring a professional touch to revitalize your vehicles and restore the vibrancy of your home furnishings, ensuring a truly comprehensive clean

gallery.alt: A split image showing the "before" and "after" of a car's interior floor. The left side ("before") shows a dirty black car carpet covered in debris and crumbs. The right side ("after") shows the same carpet clean and free of dirt. The logo "@Urban Shine" is watermarked in the middle.

A split image showing the "before" and "after" of a car's rear seat. The left side ("before") shows a soiled, discolored black fabric car seat with visible dirt and stains. The right side ("after") shows the same seat looking clean, dark, and restored to its original appearance. The logo "@Urban Shine" is watermarked in the middle.

A split image showing the "before" and "after" of a car's front passenger seat. The left side ("before") shows a dirty, speckled black fabric car seat with visible debris and a cleaning product bottle. The right side ("after") shows the same seat looking thoroughly clean, dark, and free of dirt. The logo "@Urban Shine" is watermarked in the middle.

A split image showing the "before" and "after" of a multi-colored upholstered furniture piece. The left side ("before") shows the fabric with visible dirt, smudges, and discoloration on various patches. The right side ("after") shows the same furniture fabric looking clean, with vibrant, distinct colors restored. The logo "@Urban Shine" is watermarked in the middle.

name: Orevche Beach
description: Dive into the dynamic spirit of Orevche Beach, perfectly situated on the breathtaking shores of Lake Ohrid. This isn't just a beach it's a non-stop hub of energy! From the moment the sun rises, you'll find a lively atmosphere, crystal-clear waters perfect for a refreshing dip, and stunning views that frame your day. But Orevche is truly renowned for its vibrant party scene, which ignites early and continues well into the night. Expect buzzing music, spontaneous celebrations, and an infectious good-time vibe that makes every moment a party. Whether you're chilling by the water or dancing with friends, Orevche Beach promises an unforgettable, high-energy lakeside experience.

gallery.alt: A tranquil shaded area at Orevche Beach, featuring comfortable green lounge cushions and small tables under a lush tree, with the clear blue waters of Lake Ohrid and distant umbrellas visible in the background, inviting a relaxing day by the water.

A breathtaking panoramic view of Orevche Beach from the water level, showcasing the incredibly clear, pebble-strewn shallows of Lake Ohrid. The shoreline is bustling with people enjoying the sun under a long line of green and blue beach umbrellas, nestled against a backdrop of lush green hills and a striking orange rocky outcrop under a bright blue sky.

A long, inviting stretch of Orevche Beach, lined with rows of unoccupied white and green sun loungers and matching umbrellas neatly arranged on the smooth pebble shore. The clear, calm waters of Lake Ohrid gently lap at the edge, promising a perfect day for sunbathing and swimming.

A shaded, relaxed seating area at Orevche Beach, featuring green padded lounge spots and tables on a pebble ground, set against a colorful painted wall and a sturdy stone wall, offering a cool respite from the sun.

The heart of Orevche Beach's vibrant party scene: a large outdoor stage and DJ booth with substantial speakers, ready for lively music and events. A person sits casually on tiered seating to the left, capturing the relaxed yet energetic vibe of the venue.

name: Park Golden Beach
description:
Discover Park Golden Beach, the ultimate destination on Lake Ohrid where the fun never stops! Our beautiful beach and inviting swimming pool are your playgrounds for thrilling day parties, filled with sunshine, great music, and an infectious vibe.

But the real magic happens when the stars come out! Our poolside transforms into Ohrid's hottest spot for electrifying night parties, offering an unparalleled atmosphere for dancing and creating unforgettable memories.

At Park Golden Beach, every moment is a celebration. Join us for an exhilarating experience where the lake's beauty meets non-stop entertainment.

gallery.alt: A bustling outdoor restaurant and lounge area at Park Golden Beach, filled with people enjoying drinks and conversations under large, shaded awnings. The vibrant atmosphere suggests a lively daytime gathering with distant views of Lake Ohrid.

A lively day scene at Park Golden Beach, showing a pebble beach crowded with people relaxing on sun loungers and bean bags under numerous white umbrellas. Many are also enjoying the clear waters of Lake Ohrid, with a long stone pier visible and a sunny, inviting sky overhead.

A large, inviting swimming pool at Park Golden Beach, filled with people of all ages swimming, playing, and enjoying the sun. The clear blue water, surrounded by lounge chairs, evokes a perfect day for relaxation and fun, with the "Golden Beach Park" logo visible.

A vibrant aerial view of Park Golden Beach, showcasing its large, bright blue swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers and cabanas, bustling with people. To the right, a wide beach area with numerous white umbrellas and more people leads into the clear waters of Lake Ohrid, illustrating a full-service summer leisure complex.

name: Gradishte 2 Beach Bar
description: Get ready for non-stop summer vibes at Gradishte 2 Beach Bar on Lake Ohrid! Famed for our legendary all-day parties, we bring the beats, the sun, and the clearest waters together for an unforgettable experience. Dive in, dance on the pebbles, and make memories. Your summer starts here!

name: Ana Marija
description:
Discover a true gem in Ohrid: Restaurant Ana Marija. We invite you to a place where warmth fills the air and the views are simply magnificent. Imagine settling in with loved ones, enjoying a delicious meal while gazing out at the sparkling lights of the old city and the vast, peaceful Lake Ohrid – a picture-perfect backdrop for any occasion.

What truly sets us apart is the heartbeat of our evenings: the timeless melodies of Ohridski Calgii. This beautiful traditional music isn't just background noise; it's a living part of our heritage, adding a unique, soulful touch that makes every moment feel authentically Ohrid. It's the perfect way to unwind, connect, and truly feel the spirit of our town.

Join us at Ana Marija for an experience that delights your palate and touches your heart.

gallery.alt: A beautiful outdoor patio at Restaurant Ana Marija, set with tables and chairs draped in green cloths, all framed by strategically placed green trees. The scene offers a stunning, elevated view of Ohrid's lush landscape, distant city buildings, and the expansive, sparkling Lake Ohrid under a bright sky, promising a delightful dining experience.

A spacious, covered outdoor dining area at Restaurant Ana Marija, featuring numerous tables with light blue tablecloths and dark chairs, ready for guests. Beyond the open sides, trees and a glimpse of the natural surroundings suggest a pleasant, airy dining atmosphere.

An aerial view of Restaurant Ana Marija, showing its multi-level building with red tile roofs and extensive outdoor patio areas. These patios are filled with tables, green umbrellas, and small trees, all set on a hillside overlooking the surrounding green landscape and distant homes, hinting at the restaurant's panoramic views.

A charming outdoor dining terrace at Restaurant Ana Marija, with tables and chairs shaded by well-manicured trees. The view extends far beyond the railing, revealing a vast expanse of green fields, the bustling city of Ohrid in the distance, and the serene blue of Lake Ohrid under a bright, partly cloudy sky, offering an inviting and picturesque setting.

name: Restaurant Valentino
description: Dive into a world of taste at Valentino Ohrid. We're dedicated to serving truly good food with an impressive variety of styles on our menu. Whatever your preference, you'll find a delicious experience crafted just for you. Come and discover your next culinary favorite!

gallery.alt: The interior dining area of Valentino restaurant, warmly lit with modern green ambient lighting along the ceiling. Tables are neatly set with white tablecloths and elegant green-backed chairs, with a large potted plant adding a touch of greenery.

A wide view of the inviting dining room at Valentino restaurant, showcasing multiple tables set with white tablecloths and green-backed chairs. The room is illuminated by warm green cove lighting in the ceiling, creating an elegant and comfortable atmosphere.

An evening exterior shot of Valentino Ristorante, with its distinctive green building and illuminated "VALENTINO" sign. The streetlights are on, and several cars are parked along the road, indicating the restaurant's presence in a quiet, tree-lined neighborhood at dusk.

A close-up of a delicious plate featuring sliced meat (likely pork) covered in a rich mushroom and bacon cream sauce. It's accompanied by golden roasted potato wedges, vibrant green broccoli florets, and a portion of fluffy rice, beautifully garnished with a cherry tomato and fresh herbs.

A close-up of a beautifully plated dish featuring tender grilled octopus tentacles, accompanied by roasted potato wedges, sliced grilled zucchini, and fresh orange segments. A small side bowl of vibrant tomato and olive salsa, garnished with herbs and a drizzle of dark sauce, completes this appealing and colorful meal.

name: Kaj Mestono
description:
Kaj Mestono, nestled in the serene village of Peshtani, offers a truly enchanting escape from the bustling city crowds of Ohrid. This remarkable venue boasts an unparalleled, sweeping panorama of the entire Lake Ohrid, a view so perfect it feels hand-painted.

Imagine stepping onto a terrace where the turquoise waters stretch endlessly before you, meeting the distant mountains in a hazy embrace. From sunrise's gentle glow to the breathtaking hues of sunset painting the sky over the tranquil lake, every moment here is a masterpiece. Kaj Mestono isn't just a place it's an experience, a tranquil haven where the beauty of nature takes center stage, allowing you to unwind, connect, and savor the peace that only such an incredible vista can offer. It's the ideal spot for those seeking serenity, unforgettable moments, and a visual feast for the soul, far removed from the everyday.

gallery.alt: Outdoor restaurant patio with elegantly set tables and chairs right by a calm lake, mountains in the distance under a partly cloudy sky.
A bowl of yellowish soup with a lemon wedge and a side of toast with dips, on a table overlooking a lake with seagulls flying in the blue sky and colorful flowers in foreground planters
A spacious outdoor tiled patio with various potted plants and seating, facing a large lake reflecting the setting sun under a partly cloudy sky.

A plate of roasted fish with rice and cherry tomatoes, and a glass of white wine, on a wooden table next to a railing overlooking a vast lake under a dramatic, cloudy sky with sunbeams breaking through.
Aerial view of a lakeside village with houses nestled on green hills, a beach with people and boats, and a large restaurant extending over the clear blue-green water.

name: Kaneo Letna Bavcha
description:
Kaneo Letna Bavcha, often simply known as Kaneo Restaurant & Summer Garden, isn't just one of Ohrid's most popular venues it's practically a postcard brought to life. Perched right on the serene shores of Lake Ohrid, with the iconic Church of St. John at Kaneo seemingly rising out of the water beside it, this spot offers a truly magical ambiance that's hard to beat.

Imagine savoring exquisite Macedonian cuisine, from their renowned Ohrid lake fish to fresh seafood, all while the gentle lapping of the waves provides a natural soundtrack. Whether you're enjoying a sun-drenched lunch on their expansive terrace or a romantic dinner as the sun dips below the horizon, painting the sky in fiery hues, every meal here feels like an occasion. It's a place where the stunning views compete only with the delicious flavors on your plate, creating an unforgettable sensory experience. The friendly service and the palpable sense of history in the air simply add to its charm, making Kaneo Letna Bavcha a beloved gem in the heart of Ohrid.

gallery.alt: An outdoor restaurant patio with numerous tables set with wine glasses, overlooking a lake and a rocky cliff with lush greenery under a warm, late afternoon sky.
An indoor restaurant dining area with many tables set with tablecloths and wine glasses, and a waiter standing in the background, with large windows offering a view of the lake and distant mountains.
An elegant outdoor dining area with tables set on either side of a wooden pier extending into a vast lake with mountains in the background under a blue sky.

A rectangular white platter featuring a variety of sushi rolls, spring rolls, fried seafood, and dipping sauces, garnished with cherry blossoms and bamboo branches, alongside a glass of white wine and a bamboo mat.
A slice of cheesecake with a blueberry compote base and a fresh mint leaf and blueberries on top, served on a white plate.
A bowl of creamy orange soup garnished with a dark green swirl and black sesame seeds, with decorative small pumpkins in the blurred background.

name: Golf Club Ohrid CZG
description: GOLF COURSE OHRID The golf course in Ohrid is the first and only golf center in the Republic of Macedonia – a modern complex offering a unique sports and recreational experience. The course is located within the city area, on the grounds of the former military barracks in Ohrid, just 3 km from the port and the city center. OPENING HOURS Open daily from 08:00 to 22:00. For scheduled events, operating hours can be adjusted according to the renter's needs. ABOUT THE COURSE This facility covers approximately 4 hectares and includes a 6-hole golf course (par 21) built to international standards. Compact in size, the course is carefully designed to challenge players of all skill levels. ACTIVITIES AND OFFERINGS Guests can enjoy a variety of golf-related activities. The main attraction is playing golf on the well-maintained 6-hole course. A standard round includes all 6 holes, with the option to repeat the course for a full 12 or 18-hole experience, offering a solid challenge even for experienced players. All necessary equipment is available for rent on-site – including golf clubs, bags, push trolleys, and golf balls. In addition to offerings for experienced golfers, the Golf Club also provides beginner lessons with licensed instructors. Located in the very heart of the golf course, Gibli Café is more than just a coffee bar – it is a true retreat for lovers of great coffee, peaceful atmosphere and natural beauty. We offer a carefully selected range of drinks and cocktails, perfectly complementing the taste and atmosphere of every moment. WHO IS IT FOR? The offer at Golf Club Ohrid is tailored for a variety of visitors, regardless of age, experience, or reason for visit. Golf as a sport provides the opportunity for enjoyment and socializing in a pleasant environment, making it accessible to everyone: • Families with children: The club is a great place for family activities. There is a golf academy and school for children, where young players can learn the basics of golf in a fun and safe way, under the supervision of instructors. • Tourists and beginners: Visitors to Ohrid seeking a new experience can try golf for the first time. Whether you're completely new to golf, the friendly staff and training programs will help you learn the basic rules and strokes. • Experienced golf enthusiasts: For passionate golfers, this course offers the opportunity to play in unique conditions in Macedonia. As the first (and currently only) golf course in the country, it's a must-visit destination for golfers traveling through the region looking to add a round to their itinerary. • Business professionals and groups: The clubhouse is the perfect place for corporate gatherings and networking in a relaxed, informal setting. With team-building events, business meetings, or presentations organized in the clubhouse or on the course, business guests can combine work with recreation. SERVICES OFFERED • Golf course play (6 / 12 / 18 holes) • Use of the driving range • Golf equipment rental (complete club set, bag, trolley, golf balls) • Basic training and support for beginners (introduction to rules and techniques) • Green Card Program – new golfers can complete the academy's Green Card program, earning certification and becoming amateur golfers with a starting handicap of 54. • Access to clubhouse facilities • Free parking

gallery.alt: A group of four men on a green golf course. One man in a blue shirt and blue hat is crouched down on the grass, picking up or placing a golf ball. Another man in a brightly patterned shirt stands to his right, holding a golf club. In the background, two more men watch. A golf bag on a pushcart is in the foreground to the left.

A young man is teaching two young women how to play golf at a driving range. The man is holding a golf club and demonstrating a swing, while the two women watch intently. They are all standing on a green mat on a sunny day with trees in the background. A basket of golf balls sits on the mat to the right.
A close-up, low-angle shot of a single white golf ball resting on a tee in the middle of lush green grass. The background is a soft focus of more green grass and trees under a bright, overcast sky.

Two men are on a golf course. One man in a striped shirt and black pants is walking away from a white clubhouse in the background, carrying a golf bag over his shoulder. Another man in a light blue shirt is bent over, pushing a golf bag on a cart towards the right side of the frame.

name: Queen Sunset Bar
description:
Nestled along the picturesque shores of Lake Ohrid, Queen Sunset Bar offers a truly regal experience for those seeking breathtaking views and a sophisticated ambiance. This outdoor venue, part of the Inex Olgica Hotel & Spa complex, is designed to maximize its stunning location, providing guests with unparalleled vistas of the expansive lake and the majestic mountains beyond, especially as the sun dips below the horizon.

With comfortable, stylish outdoor seating, including plush sofas and chairs set on a manicured green space, Queen Sunset Bar invites guests to relax and soak in the serene beauty. Whether you're enjoying a refreshing cocktail, a light snack, or simply taking in the magnificent sunsets that paint the sky in vibrant hues, the atmosphere here is one of relaxed elegance. It's the perfect spot to unwind after a day of exploring Ohrid, or to kick off an evening in this historic and beautiful city.

gallery.alt: A wide shot of a sunset over a large lake with mountains in the background. A boat is visible on the water, and in the foreground is a modern outdoor seating area with tables and chairs on a patio with a white railing

A group of people are seated at an outdoor bar or lounge area overlooking a large lake and distant mountains at dusk. They are sitting on comfortable outdoor sofas and chairs, some on a patch of artificial grass. A tall, white decorative lamp is prominent in the foreground.

A close-up of a yellow cocktail in a stemmed glass with a kiwi slice and two black straws, set on a white table. In the blurred background, there's a body of water under an overcast sky and a white railing.

A scenic view from an outdoor bar area, showing a vast lake and mountains in the distance under a clear sky. In the foreground, white cushioned outdoor chairs and tables are arranged along a white railing. The logo "QUEEN SUNSET BAR" is visible in the sky.

name: Lychnidia Food Zone
description:
Welcome to Lychnidia Food Zone, your culinary haven nestled right on the serene shores of the magnificent Ohrid Lake. Here, the gentle lapping of the waves provides the perfect soundtrack to an unforgettable dining experience, where every meal is infused with warmth, tradition, and a true taste of Macedonia.

Step into our welcoming space and let your senses be delighted. Our menu is a passionate celebration of diverse flavors, with a special emphasis on authentic Macedonian cuisine that tells a story with every bite. From hearty stews and grilled meats prepared with age-old recipes, to fresh catches from the lake and vibrant salads bursting with local produce, there's something to tempt every palate. We believe food is about connection, and our dishes are crafted to bring people together, sharing moments of joy and delicious discovery.

Whether you're seeking a leisurely lunch with breathtaking lake views, a romantic sunset dinner, or a lively gathering with friends and family, Lychnidia Food Zone offers a setting that feels just like home. Come and experience the magic of Ohrid, one delightful dish at a time. We can't wait to share our table with you.

gallery.alt: A stunning lakeside view at sunset, with a massive, cheesy burger impaled by a knife taking center stage on a wooden table, hinting at a hearty meal with a beautiful backdrop

Two appealing dishes, one featuring a whole fish garnished with citrus and the other a plate of what looks like fried delights, are artfully presented on a wooden counter overlooking the shimmering lake
Two people enjoy a serene sunset over the lake from a cozy, shaded outdoor dining area, capturing a moment of peaceful relaxation.
A close-up of succulent ribs, generously coated in sesame seeds and served with golden fries, looking absolutely delicious and ready to be devoured.
Inside a charming restaurant, warm lighting and rustic brick pillars create an inviting atmosphere, with tables set and ready for guests to enjoy a meal.
A beautifully organized display of wine bottles in a wooden rack, stretching across the wall, with wine glasses hanging neatly above, ready for a perfect pour.

name: Drop - Coffee & Snacks
description:
Welcome to Drop - Coffee & Snacks, your newest cozy escape right here in Ohrid!

Imagine a place where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee invites you in, and delicious, comforting snacks are always ready to tempt your taste buds. Drop is more than just a spot for a quick bite it's designed to be your little haven, whether you're catching up with friends, finding a moment of quiet, or just need that perfect pick-me-up. We're here to serve you warmth, flavor, and a smile – truly a place where you can just... drop in and feel at home.

gallery.alt: An overhead shot of various "Drop" products arranged on a wooden surface with a burlap mat. Items include a box of colorful energy balls, two smoothies, and two small coffee cups.
A person in a green jacket and light pants holds and eats from an open black "Drop" branded takeout box containing a fresh green salad with beans and mushrooms.
A close-up of a fresh sandwich on dark bread with lettuce, tomato, and mushrooms, resting on a wooden cutting board.

Two clear plastic bowls with lids, each filled with fresh, colorful salads, are placed side-by-side on a light gray concrete surface. One contains feta cheese and vegetables, the other chickpeas, beans, and hummus.
A hand with colorful painted fingernails holds a clear plastic cup of iced coffee with a "Drop" logo sticker and a black straw. The person wears a striped shirt and a leather jacket.

name: Jungle Beach
description:
Jungle Beach offers a serene and natural ambiance, living up to its name with lush surrounding greenery that provides a unique, exotic feel. This idyllic stretch of golden sand invites you to relax and soak up the sun, while the exceptionally clear and refreshing waters of Lake Ohrid are perfect for swimming.

It's known for attracting those seeking a more secluded and rustic beach experience, often described as having a "hype atmosphere" compared to some of its more laid-back neighbors. While it maintains its unspoiled charm, you can expect amenities for comfort, and it's even pet-friendly!

Beyond sunbathing and swimming, the tranquil atmosphere makes it ideal for unwinding, reading, or simply connecting with nature. For the more adventurous, nearby hiking trails offer captivating viewpoints with panoramic vistas of the lake.

Whether you're looking for a vibrant beach day with good vibes or a peaceful escape surrounded by nature, Jungle Beach offers a unique slice of paradise on Lake Ohrid.

gallery.alt: An outdoor lounge area at sunset, with colorful fabric canopies overhead. The space features low wooden tables, green cushions on the ground, and faces a calm body of water with a small boat and silhouetted figures.

A night view of an outdoor lounge area, dramatically lit with green and yellow lighting. Colorful fabric canopies stretch overhead, covering a space with low tables, green cushions on the ground, and a textured path.

name: Jovanovic SUP & Kayaks
description:
Welcome to Jovanovic SUP & Kayak Rental, your friendly gateway to exploring the stunning beauty of Lake Ohrid!

Imagine gliding across the crystal-clear waters, feeling the gentle sun on your skin, and discovering hidden coves and breathtaking views at your own pace. Whether you're a seasoned paddler or trying it for the very first time, we're here to make your adventure unforgettable.

At Jovanovic, it's more than just renting equipment; it's about creating joyful memories. Our warm and welcoming team is ready to set you up with the perfect paddleboard or kayak, offer tips, and ensure you feel confident and ready to embark on your lake journey. Come connect with nature, enjoy a peaceful escape, or have a fun-filled day with family and friends. We can't wait to share the magic of Ohrid from the water with you!

gallery.alt: A person in a red "Water Sport" life vest kneels on a white and blue paddleboard with a paddle, on clear blue water with visible rocks below the surface.

A light blue and green kayak with a red paddle and sandals rests in the shallow, clear water next to a wooden pier. In the background, traditional stilt houses of the Bay of Bones Museum are visible over the lake.

A person in a white "Jovanovic SUP & Kayak" t-shirt paddles a yellow kayak away from the shore on Lake Ohrid, with the historic old town, houses, and green hills visible in the background under a clear sky.

name: Youth Center Ohrid (YCO)
description:
Youth Center Ohrid is a vibrant hub for creative learning and cultural activities in the heart of Ohrid. This welcoming space provides young people with opportunities to explore their artistic talents, develop new skills, and connect with their community through various educational programs and workshops.

The center regularly hosts art classes, creative workshops, and cultural events that foster creativity and personal growth. With experienced instructors and a supportive environment, it's the perfect place for young minds to flourish and express themselves through various forms of artistic expression.

Whether you're interested in visual arts, learning new techniques, or participating in community events, Youth Center Ohrid offers a warm, inclusive atmosphere where creativity and learning come together.

name: Plate Bistro
description: At @platebistro, everything revolves around the kitchen. It's the kind of place where great food meets a laid-back, casual vibe. Their signature burgers — made from 100% beef, either smashed or shredded — have built a loyal following, and for good reason. If you're in the mood for something lighter, their rice-based bowl salads with chicken or beef and fresh veggies hit the spot. Mornings start with eggs for breakfast, evenings bring out the cocktails and shareable bites, and during the day, it's the perfect place to enjoy a quality coffee or a calming tea.

gallery.alt: A top-down view of two plates on a wooden table. One plate contains a pulled pork burger with a side of french fries and a small bowl of sauce. The other plate holds a bowl of food that appears to be a salad or rice bowl with various toppings, and next to it are what looks like two slices of bread and a folded omelet or crepe-like item.

A close-up, eye-level shot of a pulled pork burger with a wooden skewer stuck through the top bun, served on a red and white plate. Next to the burger is a pile of french fries and a small dish of sauce. The background is a brightly lit, out-of-focus window with the reverse text "etalo" visible.

A small white espresso cup with the "S. Giusto" logo sits on a matching saucer on a wooden table. The background is out of focus, showing a wall decorated with an assortment of decorative plates in various patterns and colors.

A close-up shot of a window with the word "plate" written in a modern, stylized font. The background, visible through the window, is a wall decorated with a collection of diverse and colorful decorative plates. There is a geometric pattern on the window glass below the text.
A white, commercial-style espresso machine with several portafilters and control panels on a countertop. In the background, a person is visible, and the word "etalo" is seen in reverse on a window.
A close-up, focused shot of a tall glass filled with an amber-colored cocktail, garnished with two orange slices. A person, out of focus and with a beard, holds the glass in the background.

A close-up, high-angle shot of a large bowl filled with various food items arranged in separate sections, including green peas, corn kernels, white rice, shredded purple cabbage, and a creamy topping. The bowl is on a wooden table, and a patterned couch is visible in the soft-focus background.
A close-up, low-angle shot of a bowl of french fries generously topped with a large amount of grated cheese and black pepper. The background is out of focus, showing a patterned fabric surface.

name: ENTiTY
description:
Step into ENTiTY, the premier electronic sports center in the heart of Ohrid, designed for both dedicated gaming enthusiasts and casual players. We've created the ultimate gaming atmosphere with top-of-the-line PCs and professional-grade gear to elevate your experience.

Our high-performance setups feature:

CPUs: AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D

GPUs: NVIDIA GeForce 4060 Ti, 4070 Ti Super, and 4080 Super

Memory: 32GB 6000MHz RAM

Immerse yourself in ultra-smooth gameplay with our cutting-edge monitors from BenQ, offering refresh rates of 240Hz, 400Hz, and even 540Hz.

For console fans, we also offer the latest PlayStation 5 Pro with 144Hz TVs for a truly next-gen experience.

Game in comfort and style with our DXRacer and Noblechair professional gaming chairs.

Whether you're training for a tournament or just looking to have fun, ENTiTY provides the perfect blend of high-end technology and a welcoming community atmosphere.

gallery.alt: A row of four high-end gaming stations with dark gaming chairs and monitors. Above the desks, a row of lit-up, custom-built PCs with clear cases and white liquid cooling systems are mounted on a shelf. The room is dimly lit with blue and purple ambient lighting.

A wide shot of a modern gaming lounge. On the left, a low wall separates a lounge area with plush sofas and low tables from the main gaming area. The lounge has a large window looking into a different section. The main gaming area features rows of computers and gaming chairs, illuminated with blue light.

A wide-angle view of an esports center with a long row of gaming PCs and chairs. The room has a dark, futuristic aesthetic with blue and purple ambient lighting. On the right, a long shelf holds several desktop computers with glowing components. On the left, a lounge area with sofas is partially visible.

A view of a row of gaming stations from the side, showing multiple black gaming chairs and monitors displaying the ENTiTY logo. Above the stations, a row of white desktop computers with custom water-cooling and illuminated components are visible. The room has a dark ambiance with purple lighting and a display case with a trophy and a jersey on a shelf in the background.

A close-up side view of a row of gaming stations. Each station has a monitor displaying the ENTiTY logo, a mechanical keyboard, headphones, and a mouse on a large gaming mat. The gaming chairs have green LED lights underneath them, and the desktop PCs on a shelf above are illuminated with a warm light.

A close-up, low-angle shot of a gaming station. A monitor displays the ENTiTY esports logo and information in a foreign language. A mechanical keyboard, mouse, and headphones are placed on a large gaming mousepad. The gaming chair is black with green accents and the room is lit with a purple light.

A close-up side view of a row of gaming stations with red and black gaming chairs. The monitors display the ENTiTY logo. The desktop PCs at the first two stations are black with glowing blue fans and components. The stations have mechanical keyboards and large mousepads, and the room is lit with a combination of blue and red ambient light.

name: Mr. I
description: Mr. I in Ohrid isn't just a bar – it's a vibe. Set just steps from the lake, it blends laid-back energy with upbeat music and a cool crowd. Whether you're starting your night with cocktails or just dropping in for a chilled beer with friends, Mr. I gives you that perfect mix of good drinks, easygoing atmosphere, and Ohrid summer charm.

gallery.alt: An indoor shot of a lounge area with a plush, tufted, burgundy sofa against a light-colored wall. In front of the sofa is a rectangular, tufted, beige ottoman serving as a coffee table. The floor is made of wood planks. Overhead, several modern light fixtures with exposed filament bulbs hang from the ceiling. A large window with horizontal blinds is on the right, letting in bright light. In the background to the left, a doorway leads to another dining area.

Two hookahs with tall, ornate bases are on a glass coffee table. The one on the left has a clear base with black hoses, while the one on the right has a blue glowing base and a blue hose. Several round tins of hookah tobacco are arranged on the table in front of the hookahs. In the background, there are framed movie posters on the wall, including one of Captain Jack Sparrow from Pirates of the Caribbean, and various lounge chairs and sofas

A tall glass of layered coffee, possibly a latte or macchiato, sits on a small glass saucer, which is placed on a glass table. The drink has a distinct layer of milk at the bottom, followed by coffee, and a thick foam top with a sprinkle of cocoa powder. Around the saucer, coffee beans are scattered. A small packet of sugar and a spoon are also on the saucer. In the background, out of focus, are green upholstered chairs and a menu.

name: Hype Gaming
description: Hype Gaming is the go-to spot in Ohrid for gamers who want it all. With high-end PCs and PlayStations ready to go, it's the perfect place to jump into your favorite games solo or with friends. Whether you're into competitive action or just casual fun, Hype brings the energy.

name: Beach & Bar K'j Divono
description: A beautiful lakeside venue combining a relaxing beach atmosphere with quality restaurant service. Perfect for enjoying meals and drinks while soaking up the stunning Lake Ohrid views in a natural outdoor setting.

gallery.alt: People sit at wooden picnic tables under large, green "Zlaten Dab" branded umbrellas in a sunny outdoor restaurant. The tables are on a paved area next to a grassy lawn. In the background, there are numerous other patrons, and beyond them, the clear blue water of a lake stretches to the horizon, surrounded by lush green trees.

A scenic view of a lake at sunset. The sun is a bright, lens-flared orb in the sky, casting a warm glow over the calm water. The foreground is a grassy area with people relaxing on sun loungers and sitting at picnic tables under green "Zlaten Dab" umbrellas. Several colorful kayaks are visible on the grass to the right, near the water's edge.

An image of a campground or picnic area, showing several large, round wooden picnic tables and benches scattered across a grassy field. In the background, multiple large campervans and cars are parked, with tall pine trees and other deciduous trees providing shade. The sky is bright and blue, and the late afternoon sun casts long shadows from the trees and tables.

name: Camperstop Divono
description: Camperstop Divono offers the perfect lakeside stop for travelers on the road. Located just steps from Lake Ohrid, it provides a peaceful place to park, rest, and recharge. With clean facilities, friendly hosts, and easy access to the beach and bar next door, it's a favorite spot for camper lovers exploring Ohrid.

gallery.alt: Several large white campervans and a travel trailer are parked on a grassy field, surrounded by tall pine trees. In the distance, a body of water is visible through the trees. The sky is overcast and the ground is covered in green grass and pine needles. A couple of picnic tables are also visible near the water's edge.

A wide-angle view of a grassy campsite on a sunny day. A large, dark-colored camper truck and a smaller orange van are parked on the left, facing a large body of water. On the right, a white campervan is parked next to a yellow pop-up tent. The sky is a clear, bright blue, and a line of mountains is visible in the distance across the water.

An open, grassy field is used as a campsite with several campervans and travel trailers lined up in the background. The vehicles are of various colors, including white, green, and yellow. The field is surrounded by trees and a few buildings are visible on the far right. The sky is partly cloudy with patches of blue.

name: Restaurant Biljanini Izvori
description: Restaurant Biljanini Izvori blends tradition, flavor, and nature in one iconic spot. Located near the famous springs, it's known for its authentic Macedonian cuisine, fresh trout, and peaceful outdoor seating surrounded by greenery. Whether you're a local or a visitor, it's a place where good food meets Ohrid's natural beauty.

gallery.alt: A peaceful outdoor scene in a park-like setting. In the center, a white, modern-style sculpture stands in the middle of a round pond. The pond is surrounded by a path and lush green trees. In the foreground, the back of a black horse-drawn carriage with red wheels is visible.

An outdoor restaurant patio is set in a green, wooded area. Patrons are seated at tables under a roof and large green umbrellas. The patio is surrounded by a curved, stone-paved path and a small lawn. Large terracotta pots with plants and hanging baskets with flowers decorate the space.

The interior of a rustic restaurant with a wooden ceiling and large windows that offer a view of trees outside. Wooden tables are set with white tablecloths and red checkered runners. The room is decorated with various items, including a model sailboat, a ship, and several antique-style lamps. A flat-screen TV is mounted high on the wall.

name: Karting Rimo
description: Karting Rimo brings the thrill of speed to the heart of Ohrid. With a well-maintained outdoor track, powerful karts, and a safe setup, it's perfect for adrenaline seekers of all ages. Whether you're racing friends or practicing solo, expect a fun, competitive vibe with some scenic lake views nearby.

gallery.alt: Two people are driving go-karts on a paved outdoor track. The track is lined with stacks of old tires, painted in alternating colors of red, orange, and black, to serve as barriers. The drivers are wearing white helmets. The sky is clear and blue, and there are trees and buildings in the background.

name: Gostilnica kaj Meche
description: Gostilnica Kaj Meche feels like home with a plate of real, hearty food. Known for its traditional Macedonian dishes, generous portions, and warm hospitality, it's the kind of place where locals gather and visitors keep coming back. Simple, tasty, and made with love.

gallery.alt: An indoor dining area with wooden tables set with plates, glasses, and napkins. A large window behind the tables offers a view of a lake and mountains.

A nighttime exterior shot of a restaurant named "ГОСТИЛНИЦА КАЈ МЕЧЕ" (Gostilnica Kaj Meche). The sign is lit up with bright white lights, and the building has a modern design with a glass-enclosed balcony

A close-up of a dish served on a wooden cutting board. The dish consists of a large piece of roasted meat topped with a thick slice of grilled onion, served with a side of french fries and a slice of tomato. The restaurant's logo and name, "ГОСТИЛНИЦА КАЈ МЕЧЕ," are branded on the board.

A close-up of a traditional Macedonian dish, possibly a stew, served in an orange clay pot. The dish is placed on a white plate with a fork and knife on a red and white checkered tablecloth. A glass of water is visible in the background. The restaurant's logo and name are visible in the top left corner.

name: Gostilnica Grne
description: Gostilnica Grne is all about real Macedonian comfort food, served with heart. Tucked in a quiet corner of Ohrid, it's known for its clay pot dishes, homemade flavors, and cozy, no-fuss atmosphere that makes you feel like you're eating at grandma's table.

gallery.alt: An indoor view of a cozy restaurant dining area with a rustic feel. The room has exposed wooden beams, brick walls, and multiple tables with checkered tablecloths. Large windows provide a view of an outdoor patio area.

A brighter, slightly different angle of the same restaurant dining area. The image shows the tables with red and white checkered tablecloths and cushioned chairs. The large glass doors are open, leading to an outdoor seating area.

A nighttime shot of the restaurant's entrance. The building has a stone foundation and a covered patio area with a wooden structure, lit by warm pendant lights. Steps lead up to the entrance, and there are potted plants and rustic decor.

A close-up, top-down view of a platter of food on a wooden board. The platter includes grilled halloumi cheese, french fries in a small clay pot, grilled onions, grilled zucchini, and grilled tomatoes. A pair of metal tongs rests on the platter.

A close-up of a bubbling dish served in a traditional clay pot. The dish appears to be a casserole or stew with melted cheese and fresh parsley on top. It's sitting on a wooden board and a napkin, on a table with a red and white checkered tablecloth.

name: Kult Café
description: Kult Café is part of the Kult Cultural Center and is open daily from 8 AM to midnight. It's the perfect place to enjoy coffee, smoothies, soft drinks, or something stronger. The café also serves as a cozy venue for book launches, cultural events, and intimate live music performances—especially focused on promoting young local music talents.

gallery.alt: Two young men playing electric guitars in a modern cafe. The one on the left is wearing a black t-shirt and the one on the right is in a light-colored, long-sleeve shirt. A drum set is partially visible in the background, along with a green hanging plant and a sign with the word "КУЛТ".

A stylish seating area in a cafe featuring two yellow wingback chairs, a dark-colored, organically shaped coffee table with metal legs, and a matching small stool. A black barrel with white text serves as an accent piece. The wall behind the chairs is dark gray with vertical wood-like slats and a gold sign that reads "КУЛТ".

A wide shot of the cafe's interior, showing a variety of seating arrangements. There are multiple small tables with chairs, a larger rectangular table, and a long tufted gray sofa. A decorative wooden panel with an eagle-like design is mounted on the wall above the sofa. A raised platform with more seating and the "КУЛТ" sign is visible in the back.

A close-up of a table in a cafe. A pink box filled with a bouquet of white and pink flowers is next to a tall glass with a purple smoothie and a black straw. A black menu with Cyrillic and English text is on the table, and in the background, a small stage area with musical instruments and the yellow chairs from the other photo can be seen.

A high-angle close-up of a cocktail in a textured glass filled with crushed ice and a garnish of star-shaped fruit slices, likely pineapple. A black bent straw is in the glass. The drink is on a wooden surface with a carved wooden sign that reads "LOVE". In the background, there is a black lantern with a decorative cutout pattern and a dark wall.

name: Kult Kulturen Centar
description: Kult Kulturen Centar is a creative and cultural space located together with Kult Café in the heart of Ohrid. It's a place where art meets coffee — regularly hosting exhibitions, book promotions, and cultural events. Currently on view is the Point of View exhibition by Iva Jovanović and Anamarija Momiroska. Also available: unique designer tables by Studio Dana Ando (for sale), and carefully selected books from the publishing house Artkonnect.

gallery.alt: Interior view of Kult Kulturen Centar's gallery space showcasing contemporary art exhibitions
Art installation or exhibition piece at Kult Kulturen Centar
Book promotion or cultural event taking place in the center's space
Designer tables by Studio Dana Ando on display in the gallery
Point of View exhibition by Iva Jovanović and Anamarija Momiroska
Selection of books from Artkonnect publishing house displayed in the center
Overview of the cultural center's multifunctional space

name: Pirustija Nedanoski
description: Pirustija Nedanoski is a traditional family-owned pottery workshop located in the village of Ramne, just above Ohrid. Known for its handmade clay products crafted with care and passed-down techniques, the studio preserves the authentic spirit of Macedonian craftsmanship. Visitors can explore the workshop, learn about the pottery process, and purchase unique ceramic pieces.

gallery.alt: An outdoor scene showing two long tables covered with red and white checkered tablecloths. A large group of people, mostly women of various ages, are seated at the tables, eating and socializing. Some other people are standing around the tables. The area is shaded by a tree and has a fence made of intertwined branches in the background.

A close-up shot of a golden-brown, baked round pastry, possibly a 'zelnik' or 'pita', sitting in a black metal pan. The pan is elevated on a rustic metal stand over a bed of glowing embers and ashes, suggesting it was cooked outdoors over a fire.

A large, round platter is completely filled with different types of baked pastries, cut into square and triangular pieces. In the center, there are three small clay bowls containing dips; two of them have a red relish, likely 'ajvar', and the third has a lighter-colored dip, possibly a yogurt-based sauce.

A person's hand is shown lifting a large, round, metal lid covered in sand and ash. The lid is being removed from a pan sitting on a stand over a fire, revealing a pastry that is in the process of being cooked. The background consists of a wall made of stacked wood logs.
